tool_description: Identifies speech and silence segments in audio to optimize transcription processing and improve accuracy.

audio_file_path.description: Path to the audio file to analyze

silence_threshold_db.description: Silence detection threshold in dB below peak

min_speech_duration_ms.description: Minimum speech segment duration in milliseconds

error_messages: Invalid threshold: Silence threshold must be between -60 and -10 dB.
Duration parameters invalid: Minimum durations must be positive integers between 50 and 5000 ms.
Audio file error: Cannot process audio file. Verify file exists and is readable.
Detection failed: Silence detection algorithm failed. Check audio quality and parameters.
usage: Provide audio file path and configure detection thresholds to identify speech and silence segments.

speech_segments.description: Array of speech segment timestamps in format 'start_ms-end_ms'

silence_segments.description: Array of silence segment timestamps in format 'start_ms-end_ms'

total_speech_duration_ms.description: Total duration of speech segments in milliseconds
